description:
The sound of bells rings out across Mt. Koya. One man passes beneath the gates of the North Star Temple.
The man who appears before Kasumi Kenshiro`s father Tesshin is Kasumi Kenshin, who has abandoned the name Himuka.
Kenshin was saved by Tesshin after he fell off a cliff and then trained under him.
As Tesshin and Kenshin face off, Kenshin describes the world he once experienced and the great hope, the re-creation of a new world, that was born from it.
"You`ve fallen, Kenshin."
Tesshin`s body exudes fighting spirit.
Source: crunchyroll
